update xm_complaints set complaint607 = #{complaint607,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inboundsearchsid = #{inboundsearchsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, complaintname = #{complaintname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complaint609 = #{complaint609,jdbcType=DATE}, complaint611 = #{complaint611,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complaint613 = #{complaint613,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complaint615 = #{complaint615,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complaint617 = #{complaint617,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where complaintsid = #{complaintsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM xm_complaints LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_complaints.smownerid left join xm_account ON xm_complaints.accountid=xm_account.accountid left join xm_contactdetails ON xm_complaints.contact_id=xm_contactdetails.contactid WHERE 1=1 ${filter}

select xm_complaints.complaintname,xm_users.user_name,xm_complaints.accountid,xm_complaints.complaint607,xm_complaints.complaint609,xm_complaints.complaint615,xm_complaints.complaint613,xm_complaints.createdtime ,xm_complaints.complaintsid as crmid FROM xm_complaints LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_complaints.smownerid left join xm_account ON xm_complaints.accountid=xm_account.accountid left join xm_contactdetails ON xm_complaints.contact_id=xm_contactdetails.contactid WHERE 1=1 ${filter} limit #{start},#{rows}
